```{r prophetInstaller}
install.packages('prophet')
```



```{r}
library(prophet)
library(ggplot2)
library(tibble)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
?prophet
?fit.prophet
```



```{r}
df = read.csv('./data/example_retail_sales.csv')
```


```{r}
df %>% head()
```


```{r}
z_scores <- abs((df$y-mean(df$y))/sd(df$y))
plot(z_scores, type="o", col="red")
```


```{r}
no_outliers = df[z_scores < 3]
length(df$y) - length(no_outliers)
```


```{r}
df %>% mutate(response=y, day=as.Date(ds)) %>% ggplot(aes(x=day, y=response)) + geom_line()
```


```{r}
m = prophet(df)
future = make_future_dataframe(m, periods=100)
```


```{r}
future %>% tail()
```

```{r}
forecast = predict(m, future)
tail(forecast[c('ds', 'yhat', 'yhat_lower', 'yhat_upper')])
```


```{r}
plot(m, forecast)
```


```{r}
prophet_plot_components(m, forecast)
```


### Interactive graph
```{r}
dyplot.prophet(m, forecast)
```
